data.text: The Food Was Amazing, service was excellent thanks to April  she took care of the smallest details to make the experience memorable she was helpful and very professional and attentive and polite. The Iftar buffet was very organized and the decoration of the restaurant was nice.
data.title: Iftar At The Restaurant In The Address Dubai Mall Hotel

data.text: Ranjith has been an excellent house keeper. Our hotel rooms are clean and tidy due to his professionalism. Our bed is now immaculate, inviting us for a nap and bath area sparkling. Living area “liveable” for our view of the Burj and Mall. Thank you Ranjith !!!
data.title: Room cleaning Address Dubai Mall

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Thank you for taking the time to recognize the excellent service provided by Ranjith, our dedicated housekeeper, during your stay at The Address Dubai Mall Hotel. We are thrilled to hear about your positive experience and the impact Ranjith's professionalism has had on your stay.

Maintaining cleanliness and tidiness in our hotel rooms is of utmost importance to us, and we're delighted that Ranjith's attention to detail and dedication have ensured that your room is immaculate. It's wonderful to hear that your bed is now inviting for a nap and that the bath area is sparkling clean, allowing you to relax and rejuvenate during your stay.

We're also pleased to know that you're enjoying the breathtaking views of the Burj and Mall from your living area. Providing our guests with comfortable and enjoyable accommodations is our top priority, and we're glad that Ranjith's efforts have contributed to enhancing your overall experience.

Your kind words will be shared with Ranjith and the entire housekeeping team, as they serve as motivation for us to continue delivering exceptional service to all our guests.

Thank you once again for choosing The Address Dubai Mall Hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay in the future.

Regards
Raj Seedeeal
Management Office
owner_response.author: Raj Seedeeal

data.text:
The hotel is nice and has a lovely quiet vibe. We had great service from Ravi who assisted us with all of our needs and even surprised the children with a soft toy each. 
The room and lounge room were perfect and he worked around my screaming children and which wasn’t easy.
data.title: Great service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Thank you for sharing your positive experience at Address Dubai Mall Hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our hotel's nice ambiance and experienced great service during your stay.

It brings us joy to know that Ravi provided exemplary assistance, ensuring that all your needs were met and even going the extra mile to surprise your children with soft toys. We will be sure to pass along your kind words to him.

We understand that traveling with children can sometimes be challenging, and we are pleased that our team was able to accommodate your family's needs seamlessly.

Thank you for choosing Address Dubai Mall Hotel for your stay. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back for another wonderful experience in the near future.

Regards
Raj Seedeeal
Management Office
owner_response.author: Raj Seedeeal

data.text: Dilliraj was our waiter and he was o friendly and polite, great service! We will definitely be returning, great value for money and amazing views ! It’s 200AED and 150AED is redeemable on food & drinks.  Cocktails were lovely too, I had a mocktail and my partner had the alcoholic one.
data.title: Fantastic views and service!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Thank you immensely for taking the time to share your delightful experience with us here at Address Dubai Mall. We are absolutely thrilled to learn that Dilliraj's attentive service left such a positive impression on you. Your kind words regarding our stunning views, value for money, and the quality of our cocktails are truly appreciated.

It's our utmost priority to ensure that each guest feels welcomed and valued throughout their time with us, and it's heartening to know that we succeeded in exceeding your expectations. Rest assured, we will pass on your commendations to Dilliraj, as well as our entire team, as they take great pride in providing exceptional service.

We eagerly await your return and look forward to providing you with another memorable experience. Should you have any further feedback or requests, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Regards,
Raj Seedeeal
Management Office
owner_response.author: Raj Seedeeal

data.text:
One of the best place to do a corporate event in Dubai!

To Rim Zeqri, we would like to express our deepest thank you for all your help for making our event last Monday a very successful one. You’ve been very very helpful from day 1 till the day of the event. Having a venue with a reliable and flexible source like Rim is one of kind.

The banquet team Whalid & Chandra managed to exceptionally execute all our request on the day and having a good weather is a bonus! 😊
We would like to thank as well the sound engineer that is with us all through out the event. 

The venue is outstanding and world class, the food is excellent, and the service is wonderful!

We are looking forward to working with Address Dubai Mall again!
data.title: ADDRESS DUBAI MALL! - BEST HOTEL WITH THE BEST VIEW AND BEST PEOPLE!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

We are truly honored by your glowing review of your recent event experience at Address Dubai Mall. It was our pleasure to have been a part of making your event a resounding success.

Rim Zeqri, along with our dedicated banquet team, Walid and Chandra, are thrilled to receive your heartfelt appreciation. Your kind words reinforce our commitment to providing exceptional service and ensuring that each guest's experience exceeds expectations. We will be sure to pass on your commendations to them and the entire team.

We are delighted that you found our venue outstanding and world-class, the food excellent, and the service wonderful. Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal, and it brings us great joy to know that we have succeeded in delivering a memorable experience for you and your guests.

Thank you once again for choosing Address Dubai Mall. We eagerly await the opportunity to welcome you back for future events, and we assure you that we will continue to strive for excellence in every aspect of our service.

Regards
Raj Seedeeal
Management Office
owner_response.author: Raj Seedeeal
